t:
“Please! Stop! You don't understand,” I begged as the policeman dragged me away from my little brother while another untied him.




Today's a full moon, and once he
                    transforms, they'll
                    regret ignoring me.
c:
It's a little sad that I'd to tie him up. He's trying to stop my transformation.



#fullmoon #tied #safe #police #ignorance #werewolf #transformation #disaster
